front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology--Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Specific Requirements Part 3: Carrier Sense Multiple Access With Collision Detection (CSMA/CD) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications (Revision of IEEE Std 802.3-2005 Including All Approved Amendments)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This draft is a revision of IEEE Std 802.3-2005, as modified by approved amendments IEEE Std 802.3an-2006 10GBASE-T, IEEE Std 802.3aq-2006 10GBASE-LRM and IEEE Std 802.3as-2006 Frame Expansion, approved corrigendum IEEE Std 802.3-2005/Cor 1-2006 DTE Power Isolation and the balloted amendment IEEE P802.3ap Backplane Ethernet as well as the content of draft IEEE Std 802.3-2005/Cor 2-2007 10GBASE-T. Clause 43 Link Aggregation, and related material, has been extracted to the IEEE P802.1AX draft. This draft also includes all maintenance requests ready for ballot at the time of the January 2007 Maintenance meeting with the exception of the requests that have been forwarded to IEEE P802.3at DTE Power Enhancements. Further information about maintenance requests can be found at the URL: http://www.ieee802.org/3/maint/index.html. Draft D2.3 is prepared by the IEEE 802.3ay Maintenance #9 (revision) Task Force for Sponsor recirculation ballot. This draft expires 21st December 2008.
